game.title: Magic Tiles 3 – Music and Rhythm Tapping Game
name: Magic Tiles 3
magic-tiles-3
game.s_dis: Magic Tiles 3 is a music and rhythm game where players tap black piano tiles to the beat of songs while avoiding white tiles, with over 45,000 songs available.
game.l_dis:
Play Magic Tiles 3 – Rhythm-Based Piano Game

Magic Tiles 3 – Unblocked challenges players to tap black piano tiles in time with music while avoiding white tiles. Enjoy a vast library of songs across genres like pop, EDM, hip-hop, and classical.

What is Magic Tiles 3?

Magic Tiles 3 is a rhythm and music tapping game that tests timing, reflexes, and coordination. Players can play solo, compete with friends in beat battles, or challenge others worldwide in online modes.

How to Play

  • Tap black tiles: Follow the beat and tap only black tiles.
  • Avoid white tiles: Missing or tapping white tiles ends the streak.
  • Choose songs: Select from thousands of songs across multiple genres.
  • Compete online: Challenge friends or players worldwide in beat battles.
  • Practice and improve: Master timing and accuracy to achieve high scores.

Key Features

  • Huge Song Library: Over 45,000 official and licensed songs across genres.
  • Single-Player Mode: Enjoy solo play and improve your skills.
  • Online Multiplayer: Compete with friends and global players.
  • Beat Battles: Play live matches against opponents for high scores.
  • Rhythm Challenge: Tap accurately to match the music and achieve combos.

Why Play Magic Tiles 3?

If you love music, rhythm challenges, and competitive gameplay, Magic Tiles 3 offers an engaging platform to test your reflexes and enjoy thousands of songs worldwide.

Tap to the Beat!

Follow the rhythm, avoid mistakes, and climb the leaderboards in this addictive music game!
